amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that funds be available for annuity protection for Special Agents of the FBI who had completed a total of 3 or more years in field supervisory positions as of June 3, 2004 who are subsequently transferred to positions at a lower grade because they chose not to accept transfers within the FBI.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Rogers (MI) amendment was withdrawn.
